gw.cc.contact.entity

Interface Review

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.bundle.InsertCallback, com.guidewire.pl.system.bundle.UpdateCallback

    public interface Review
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.bundle.UpdateCallback, com.guidewire.pl.system.bundle.InsertCallback

    A service provider review.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatusString

        java.lang.String getStatusString()
        Returns:
        The localized description of the current completion status (e.g., complete or incomplete) of the review.

      • complete

        boolean complete()

        Completes the review. This operation will update the review scores and validate the link status of the associated contact before finally setting the review status to completed. Completing the review will update ContactCenter with the information captured for this review. This will prompt ContactCenter to recalculate the aggregate scores for the vendor.

        If the review had already been completed, calling this method has no effect and the return value will be false.

        Returns:
        true if the review was successfully completed or false if the review was already completed beforehand.

      • delete

        void delete()

        Deletes the review. Deleting the review will update ContactCenter and remove the information captured for this review. This will prompt ContactCenter to recalculate the aggregate scores for the vendor.

      • updateScores

        java.lang.Integer updateScores()

        Updates the score of the review if it is incomplete. If the review is not completed, ContactCenter will calculate and update score. If the review has already been completed, the score has already been finalized and that score will be returned.

        Returns:
        the score of the review

      • updateAndGetSimpleScores

        java.lang.Integer updateAndGetSimpleScores()

        The default scoring algorithm for reviews.

        Returns:
        the score of the review

      • getSortedQuestionAnswerSets

        ReviewQAnswerSet[] getSortedQuestionAnswerSets()
        Returns:
        an ordered list (sorted by ElementOrder) of review question answer sets for this review

      • getSortedCategoryScores

        ReviewCategoryScore[] getSortedCategoryScores()
        Returns:
        a sorted list of categories associated with this Review and their scores.

      • setReviewType

        void setReviewType(ReviewType value)
        Sets the value of the ReviewType field.

      • setClaim

        void setClaim(Claim value)
        Sets the value of the Claim field.
